archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.1.4a: a) identifying areas of the organisation that have significant human vulnerabilities (e.g. a job role that might be particularly susceptible to social engineering-based attacks)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
